verses.verse: Furthermore David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> said<WH559> unto all<WH3605> the congregation,<WH6951> Solomon<WH8010> my son,<WH1121> whom alone<WH259> God<WH430> hath chosen,<WH977> is yet young<WH5288> and tender,<WH7390> and the work<WH4399> is great:<WH1419> for<WH3588> the palace<WH1002> is not<WH3808> for man,<WH120> but<WH3588> for the LORD<WH3068> God.<WH430>

Now I have prepared<WH3559> with all<WH3605> my might<WH3581> for the house<WH1004> of my God<WH430> the gold<WH2091> for things to be made of gold,<WH2091> and the silver<WH3701> for things of silver,<WH3701> and the brass<WH5178> for things of brass,<WH5178> the iron<WH1270> for things of iron,<WH1270> and wood<WH6086> for things of wood;<WH6086> onyx<WH7718> stones,<WH68> and stones to be set,<WH4394> glistering<WH6320> stones,<WH68> and of divers colors,<WH7553> and all manner<WH3605> of precious<WH3368> stones,<WH68> and marble<WH7893> stones<WH68> in abundance.<WH7230>

Moreover, <WH5750> because I have set my affection<WH7521> to the house<WH1004> of my God,<WH430> I have<WH3426> of mine own proper good,<WH5459> of gold<WH2091> and silver,<WH3701> which I have given<WH5414> to the house<WH1004> of my God,<WH430> over<WH4605> and above all<WH4480> <WH3605> that I have prepared<WH3559> for the holy<WH6944> house,<WH1004>

Even three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> talents<WH3603> of gold,<WH2091> of the gold<WH4480> <WH2091> of Ophir,<WH211> and seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> talents<WH3603> of refined<WH2212> silver,<WH3701> to overlay<WH2902> the walls<WH7023> of the houses<WH1004> withal:

The gold<WH2091> for things of gold,<WH2091> and the silver<WH3701> for things of silver,<WH3701> and for all manner<WH3605> of work<WH4399> to be made by the hands<WH3027> of artificers.<WH2796> And who<WH4310> then is willing<WH5068> to consecrate his service<WH4390> <WH3027> this day<WH3117> unto the LORD?<WH3068>

Then the chief<WH8269> of the fathers<WH1> and princes<WH8269> of the tribes<WH7626> of Israel,<WH3478> and the captains<WH8269> of thousands<WH505> and of hundreds,<WH3967> with the rulers<WH8269> of the king's<WH4428> work,<WH4399> offered willingly,<WH5068>

And gave<WH5414> for the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of God<WH430> of gold<WH2091> five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> talents<WH3603> and ten thousand<WH7239> drams,<WH150> and of silver<WH3701> ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> talents,<WH3603> and of brass<WH5178> eighteen thousand<WH7239> <WH8083> <WH505> talents,<WH3603> and one hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> talents<WH3603> of iron.<WH1270>

And they with<WH854> whom precious stones<WH68> were found<WH4672> gave<WH5414> them to the treasure<WH214> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> by<WH5921> the hand<WH3027> of Jehiel<WH3171> the Gershonite.<WH1649>

Then the people<WH5971> rejoiced,<WH8055> for<WH5921> that they offered willingly,<WH5068> because<WH3588> with perfect<WH8003> heart<WH3820> they offered willingly<WH5068> to the LORD:<WH3068> and David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> also<WH1571> rejoiced<WH8055> with great<WH1419> joy.<WH8057>

Wherefore David<WH1732> blessed<WH1288> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> before<WH5869> all<WH3605> the congregation:<WH6951> and David<WH1732> said,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> be thou,<WH859> LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> our father,<WH1> forever<WH4480> <WH5769> and ever.<WH5704> <WH5769>

Thine, O LORD,<WH3068> is the greatness,<WH1420> and the power,<WH1369> and the glory,<WH8597> and the victory,<WH5331> and the majesty:<WH1935> for<WH3588> all<WH3605> that is in the heaven<WH8064> and in the earth<WH776> is thine; thine is the kingdom,<WH4467> O LORD,<WH3068> and thou art exalted<WH4984> as head<WH7218> above all.<WH3605>

Both riches<WH6239> and honor<WH3519> come of<WH4480> <WH6440> thee, and thou<WH859> reignest<WH4910> over all;<WH3605> and in thine hand<WH3027> is power<WH3581> and might;<WH1369> and in thine hand<WH3027> it is to make great,<WH1431> and to give strength<WH2388> unto all.<WH3605>
Now <WH6258> therefore, our God,<WH430> we<WH587> thank<WH3034> thee, and praise<WH1984> thy glorious<WH8597> name.<WH8034>

But <WH3588> who<WH4310> am I,<WH589> and what<WH4310> is my people,<WH5971> that<WH3588> we should be able<WH6113> <WH3581> to offer so willingly<WH5068> after this sort?<WH2063> for<WH3588> all things<WH3605> come of<WH4480> thee, and of thine own<WH4480> <WH3027> have we given<WH5414> thee.

For <WH3588> we<WH587> are strangers<WH1616> before<WH6440> thee, and sojourners,<WH8453> as were all<WH3605> our fathers:<WH1> our days<WH3117> on<WH5921> the earth<WH776> are as a shadow,<WH6738> and there is none<WH369> abiding.<WH4723>

O LORD<WH3068> our God,<WH430> all<WH3605> this<WH2088> store<WH1995> that<WH834> we have prepared<WH3559> to build<WH1129> thee a house<WH1004> for thine holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> cometh of thine hand,<WH4480> <WH3027> and is all<WH3605> thine own.

I know<WH3045> also, my God,<WH430> that<WH3588> thou<WH859> triest<WH974> the heart,<WH3824> and hast pleasure<WH7521> in uprightness.<WH3476> As for me,<WH589> in the uprightness<WH4339> of mine heart<WH3824> I have willingly offered<WH5068> all<WH3605> these things:<WH428> and now<WH6258> have I seen<WH7200> with joy<WH8057> thy people,<WH5971> which are present<WH4672> here,<WH6311> to offer willingly<WH5068> unto thee.

O LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Abraham,<WH85> Isaac,<WH3327> and of Israel,<WH3478> our fathers,<WH1> keep<WH8104> this<WH2063> forever<WH5769> in the imagination<WH3336> of the thoughts<WH4284> of the heart<WH3824> of thy people,<WH5971> and prepare<WH3559> their heart<WH3824> unto<WH413> thee:

And give<WH5414> unto Solomon<WH8010> my son<WH1121> a perfect<WH8003> heart,<WH3824> to keep<WH8104> thy commandments,<WH4687> thy testimonies,<WH5715> and thy statutes,<WH2706> and to do<WH6213> all<WH3605> these things, and to build<WH1129> the palace,<WH1002> for the which<WH834> I have made provision.<WH3559>

And David<WH1732> said<WH559> to all<WH3605> the congregation,<WH6951> Now<WH4994> bless<WH1288> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430> And all<WH3605> the congregation<WH6951> blessed<WH1288> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of their fathers,<WH1> and bowed down their heads,<WH6915> and worshiped<WH7812> the LORD,<WH3068> and the king.<WH4428>

And they sacrificed<WH2076> sacrifices<WH2077> unto the LORD,<WH3068> and offered<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> unto the LORD,<WH3068> on the morrow<WH4283> after that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> even a thousand<WH505> bullocks,<WH6499> a thousand<WH505> rams,<WH352> and a thousand<WH505> lambs,<WH3532> with their drink offerings,<WH5262> and sacrifices<WH2077> in abundance<WH7230> for all<WH3605> Israel: <WH3478>

And did eat<WH398> and drink<WH8354> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> on that<WH1931> day<WH3117> with great<WH1419> gladness.<WH8057> And they made<WH4427> Solomon<WH8010> the son<WH1121> of David<WH1732> king the second time,<WH8145> and anointed<WH4886> him unto the LORD<WH3068> to be the chief governor,<WH5057> and Zadok<WH6659> to be priest.<WH3548>

Then Solomon<WH8010> sat<WH3427> on<WH5921> the throne<WH3678> of the LORD<WH3068> as king<WH4428> instead of<WH8478> David<WH1732> his father,<WH1> and prospered;<WH6743> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> obeyed<WH8085> <WH413> him.

And all<WH3605> the princes,<WH8269> and the mighty men,<WH1368> and all<WH3605> the sons<WH1121> likewise<WH1571> of king<WH4428> David,<WH1732> submitted<WH5414> <WH3027> themselves unto<WH8478> Solomon<WH8010> the king.<WH4428>

And the LORD<WH3068> magnified<WH1431> <WH853> Solomon<WH8010> exceedingly<WH4605> in the sight<WH5869> of all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> and bestowed<WH5414> upon<WH5921> him such royal<WH4438> majesty<WH1935> as<WH834> had not<WH3808> been<WH1961> on<WH5921> any<WH3605> king<WH4428> before<WH6440> him in<WH5921> Israel.<WH3478>
Thus David<WH1732> the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> reigned<WH4427> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> Israel.<WH3478>

And the time<WH3117> that<WH834> he reigned<WH4427> over<WH5921> Israel<WH3478> was forty<WH705> years;<WH8141> seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> reigned<WH4427> he in Hebron,<WH2275> and thirty<WH7970> and three<WH7969> years reigned<WH4427> he in Jerusalem.<WH3389>
And he died<WH4191> in a good old age,<WH7872> <WH2896> full<WH7649> of days,<WH3117> riches,<WH6239> and honor:<WH3519> and Solomon<WH8010> his son<WH1121> reigned<WH4427> in his stead.<WH8478>

Now the acts<WH1697> of David<WH1732> the king,<WH4428> first<WH7223> and last,<WH314> behold,<WH2009> they are written<WH3789> in<WH5921> the book<WH1697> of Samuel<WH8050> the seer,<WH7203> and in<WH5921> the book<WH1697> of Nathan<WH5416> the prophet,<WH5030> and in<WH5921> the book<WH1697> of Gad<WH1410> the seer,<WH2374>

With <WH5973> all<WH3605> his reign<WH4438> and his might,<WH1369> and the times<WH6256> that<WH834> went over<WH5674> <WH5921> him, and over<WH5921> Israel,<WH3478> and over<WH5921> all<WH3605> the kingdoms<WH4467> of the countries.<WH776>
